website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer lounge pants without cuffs, this pair is for you. Lightweight, breathable, and an elastic waistband make these an ultra comfortable option to lounge in all day.
pros: Poly-cotton blend is lightweight, airy, and nonrestrictive
Drawstring waistband allows for easy adjustment
Features 2 handy side-seam pockets and a functional buttoned fly
cons: Legs run long, but there is some shrinkage with washing

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Nautica for my ultra comfy lounge pants!
customer_reviews.text: I look fly in these pajama pants while binge watching my netflix shows. They are somewhat lightweight but quite warm, and most importantly they are ultra comfortable. They have two draw strings on the waist line that you can tighten on loosen depending on how much snacking you've been doing, and I appreciate having pockets on both sides so I can keep my phone and wallet handy if needed. These Nautica lounge pants are reasonably priced, and are the perfect lazy day companion. I've even went out in public with them on and got no weird looks, bonus!
